As an ex PAT I find it really annoying not to be able to watch some of my favourite programmes using the various iPlayers, such as the BBC iPlayer. I am happy to pay a reasonable sum for viewing a programme, say £1 for a 1/2 hour episode or £2 for a one hour episode or £3 for a 2 hour drama. This is in line with a DVD rental or SKY Pay Per View.

Would it be possible to get the BBC, which is a licence funded Public Service Broadcaster, to make this available. It would also help bolster their coffers in this cash strapped time. I think ITV, CH4 and CH5 would follow suit if successful.
